text: Charles Bishop Scarborough III (born November 4, 1943) is an American television journalist and author. Beginning in 1974, he has been the lead news anchor at WNBC. He also appeared on NBC News. He currently anchors News 4 New York at 6 p.m. every weeknight."Chuck Scarborough". NBC News official site. nbcnewyork.com. October 21, 2008; updated April 27, 2017. Retrieved May 12, 2020.
